title: About
text:
About
I’m a Product Manager owning various Data Science applications for a large insurance company. I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Applied Cognition and Neuroscience, specializing in Computational Modeling/Intelligent Systems.

title: Assignment 1
text: Is there a correlation between volume of threatening events and local temperature in New York, US?

title: Assignment 1
text:
How data can be collected

Download data from GDELT based on event code and NY state for the past 5 years
Download historical temperature reading for NY in the past 5 years, possible sources: ncei.noaa.gov/cdo-web/

title: Assignment 1
text:
What methods could be considered?

Scatter plots
Linear regression
K-nearest
